resources.string: Location service must be enabled to be able to do Bluetooth Low Energy scan.
Bluetooth must be enabled to be able to use this app.

The following permissions are required to do a Bluetooth Low Energy scan. 

1. Bluetooth.
2. Location.

Next request to grant the missing permissions will be prompted.

Since the communication between this app and the bots are Bluetooth Low Energy based and the app works based on SMS notifications hence the following permissions are required to be able to use the app.

1. Bluetooth.
2. SMS receive and read.

Next request to grant the missing permissions will be prompted.

All the requested permissions must be granted to be able to use the app.\n\nNote that if you have denied a permission with \'Never ask again\' checked then you must change the app\'s permission settings to grant the permissions as in this case the request for the permission will not be prompted anymore.
The bot is already added and can\'t be added again.
